Author: Gotest
Name: Kingdom Hearts UI Bars
Description:
A plugin that makes Kingdom Hearts UI stuff, such as a health bar for the player.
If you have any questions, issues or suggestions, please post an issue in the github or ping me in the Discord!
Punchline: HP bar, MP bar, EXP bar, oh my!
Changelog:
Fixed controller mode hiding the UI, added text formatting options, added exp text, added custom image loading for 'portraits'
Hotfix 1.0.1.1: Fixed issues with setting portrait images and a color issue with Danger.
